author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 25-year-old man was murdered at SM Nagar near Pallavansalai on Tuesday night. Police officials investigating the case cited gang rivalry as the motive for murder.

The deceased was identified as D. Mugilan, whose neck was slashed after he got into an argument with two other men from the same neighbourhood.

His brother Silambarasan, who tried to intervene, was knocked down unconscious and his friend, Narasimhan, suffered injuries. The police have arrested M. Rakesh (20), a painter in connection with the case. “All these men are more or less of the same age. We are currently conducting an inquiry to get more details,” said an official from Triplicane Police Station.
title: Youth murdered after argument with two others
